1.title: A Magical Mishap

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: When ordinary teenage girl Kyra is caught in a magical tug of war between Imogen, a mischievous elf, and Lily, a conscientious fairy, she discovers an extraordinary world of magic that exists in secret all around and her life changes forever.

2.title: Magic in the Air

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Unable to control her magic, Kyra joins Maxwell's school. Kyra feels like an outsider, but when the class is assigned to solve a magical problem, Kyra's intervention saves the day.

3.title: All the World's a Stage

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: When Kyra's friend Peter witnesses her doing magic, Lily tries to wipe the events from Peter's mind. The spell goes wrong, and now Peter believes he's Shakespeare's Romeo. Can a reversal spell be found?

4.title: Gone to the Dogs

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Lily and Imogen's assignment to protect an enchanted letterbox goes wrong and a postman is transformed into a dog. The dog goes missing, so they need Kyra to use her dog-whispering ability to find him.

5.title: A Knight to Remember

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: While Ruksy is giving a tour of the magical Museum, a suit of armour escapes. Kyra wants to help put the armour back before it exposes the magical world, but Imogen has been struggling to teach Kyra how to 'jump' and can't see that she'll be any use. But Kyra comes up with a solution that no one else has seen...

6.title: The Test

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Kyra and her class are assessed on their ability to handle magical outbreaks. Everyone is surprised when Agent Orla arrives to observe, and Kyra feels under pressure to prove herself.

7.title: Fairy for a Day

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Kyra is confused about her place in the magical world, so Lily transforms her into a fairy; tiny Kyra gets trapped in a girl's bedroom.

8.title: Shortcut

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Kyra finds it difficult maintaining her double life; when the struggle begins to affect her basketball skills, Lily and Imogen use magic to help Kyra win.

9.title: On the Beach

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: When Kyra and Darra are stranded on a magical beach, Kyra discovers she has a new magical power. Kyra's attraction to Darra grows as they are forced to work together to save themselves.

10.title: Unchartered Waters

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: After seeing suspicious CCTV footage, Peter follows Darra to Maxwell's Bookshop where he films Kyra disappearing through a wall; Maxwell and Sean realize that Kyra's new power can only have come from the fabled orb.

11.title: A Fairy Tale

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: Peter threatens to publish his footage of Maxwell's Bookshop online if Kyra doesn't take him to the Library and explain the secret magical world.

12.title: Aisle 13

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: A brush against a magical book re-ignites Kyra's new magic - the unpredictable power transforms Maxwell into a guinea pig. Mathilda becomes suspicious about Kyra's unusual friends.

13.title: Fun and Games

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: Ruksy, Imogen and Lily venture into the dangerous Restricted Section of the Library in search of the truth about Kyra'snew magical powers.

14.title: The Eye of Horus

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

14.plot: Kyra and Ruksy confront Maxwell about Kyra's extraordinary power and the Professor opens up about his past as a DMI agent.

15.title: Judgement Day

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

15.plot: Kyra's joke on Sean back fires, whilst Peter and Rusky tackle a magical problem that has escaped from the library.

16.title: The Prize

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

16.plot: When the DMI student awards fall on the day Kyra's step-dad wants to take her camping, Kyra hopes she can attend and still make it home in time. Will she be able to make it?

17.title: The Accussed

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

17.plot: Kyra is shocked to learn her Orb magic and all her memories of the magical world will be removed. Desperate to remember, Kyra gets Peter to make a film that will remind her of all that has happened. Before Kyra's magic can be removed however, the Orb is stolen from the library and Imogen appears to be the culprit.

18.title: On the Case

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

18.plot: Imogen hides out in Kyra's room while she, Kyra, Peter and Ruksy try to discover who stole the Orb; when Kyra senses the Orb is in use, she jumps to the library and finds Orla manipulating Darra and Lily to steal the Orb magic.

19.title: End of the Road, Part 1

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

19.plot: Without magic or memory of the magical world, Kyra is unaware that Orla has taken over the DMI, intending to reveal magic to the humans.

20.title: End of the Road, Part 2

episode of.title: The Bureau of Magical Things (TV Series 2018– )

20.plot: As Maxwell and the class try to reclaim the Orb, Kyra's memory and magic return. But then Orla releases a dangerous artefact into River City and, with the DMI in lockdown, only Kyra and her friends have any chance of defeating Orla.

imdb.plot outline: Once upon a time the human world and the world of magic - called the fae world - existed in harmony. But as technology advanced, the fae world was pushed back. Faeries and other magical creatures became endangered species. Now someone wants to change that and restore magic to its rightful place - no matter the cost. Kyra and Peter must solve the mystery of who that enigmatic figure is and how they will achieve their goal. The investigation leads them to uncover secrets in both the human and fae worlds that no one could have imagined.
imdb.title: The Bureau of Magical Things
plot: Teenage girl Kyra accidentally discovers an extraordinary world and gains magical powers; when an unexpected threat emerges, she must unite fairies, elves and humans to save them all.

Once upon a time the human world and the world of magic - called the fae world - existed in harmony. But as technology advanced, the fae world was pushed back. Faeries and other magical creatures became endangered species. Now someone wants to change that and restore magic to its rightful place - no matter the cost. Kyra and Peter must solve the mystery of who that enigmatic figure is and how they will achieve their goal. The investigation leads them to uncover secrets in both the human and fae worlds that no one could have imagined.

When ordinary teenage girl Kyra is caught in a magical tug of war between Imogen, a mischievous elf, and Lily, a conscientious fairy, she discovers an extraordinary world of magic that exists in secret all around and her life changes forever.

_The Bureau of Magical Things_ (qv) is a children's fantasy drama told through the eyes of a teenage girl called Kyra who uncovers a magical world. Once upon a time the human world and the world of magic - called the fae world - existed in harmony. But as technology advanced, the fae world was pushed back. Faeries and other magical creatures became endangered species. Now someone wants to change that and restore magic to its rightful place - no matter the cost. Kyra and Peter must solve the mystery of who that enigmatic figure is and how they will achieve their goal. The investigation leads them to uncover secrets in both the human and fae worlds that no one could have imagined.::ahmetkozan
